leadingComments.value: Find the last line break starting backwards from the index just before
pos.  This allows us to correctly handle ths case where the character at
pos  is a line break as well.

trailingComments.value: pos is a position in the first line of source.

leadingComments.value: pos is a position in the first line of source.

trailingComments.value: Subtracting two offsets gives length; subtract 1 to get the offset.

leadingComments.value: Subtracting two offsets gives length; subtract 1 to get the offset.

comments.value: Find the last line break starting backwards from the index just before
pos.  This allows us to correctly handle ths case where the character at
pos  is a line break as well.
pos is a position in the first line of source.
Subtracting two offsets gives length; subtract 1 to get the offset.

tokens.value: Find the last line break starting backwards from the index just before
pos.  This allows us to correctly handle ths case where the character at
pos  is a line break as well.
pos is a position in the first line of source.
Subtracting two offsets gives length; subtract 1 to get the offset.
